metadata.title: CVE-2017-1001001 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: PluXml version 5.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting vulnerability, within the article creation page, which can result in escalation of privileges.

criterions.comment: pluxml package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6-1').
